Product Description: Versatile 3-Blade System: Cheese grater comes with 3 interchangeable blades - a slicing blade, a coarse shredding blade, and a fine shredding blade. This material is not only sharp, ensuring efficient and precise cutting, but also resistant to rust and corrosion, guaranteeing a long - lasting performance. | Large Mouth Design: Featuring a large - mouth design, our cheese grater allows you to easily insert larger pieces of food. This means less pre - cutting and more convenience. Whether it's a big block of cheese or a whole carrot, you can simply put it into the grater, saving you time and effort in food preparation. | Convenient Disassembly and Cleaning: Our cheese grater is designed for easy disassembly.
